name: Simple Salad Dressing
author: Grillzilla
summary: Salad dressing from scratch that you can mix up to your own taste preference. This is so delish!
ingredients: 1 head iceberg lettuce, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 head romaine, cut into bite-sized pieces
½ head chicory, cut into bite-sized pieces
½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or to taste
¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
directions: Run a fork down the length of the cucumber to create thin stripes
Mix cucumber, iceberg lettuce, romaine, tomatoes, and chicory together in a large bowl
Add olive oil and balsamic vinegar; toss to coat
Season with Italian seasoning, lemon juice, celery seed, garlic salt, pepper, and ginger
Garnish salad with pignoli and Parmesan cheese
